bike.description: M5 alloy, 29" geometry, fully manipulated frame w/ ORE DT/TT, gussetless TT S/M, tapered HT, 142mm drop-outs, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 100mm travel

components.description: Fox/Specialized remote Mini-Brain, inertia valve, w/ Brain Fade adjust, 187x47mm, 29er hose length
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Hi Lo 142+ disc, double sealed cartridge bearing, RWS, 32h
Thomson Elite Setback w/ 12 degree clamp, 410mm
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
